column1: Honours Bachelor of Food Studies Program H317  George Brown College2024.json
column13: The Honours Bachelor of Food Studies embraces experiential learning as a key component of the program delivery. There is a 14-week 420-hour work-integrated learning opportunity between the second and third years. Students will also take field trips in the surrounding area and complete two 16-hour community-engaged learning placements as part of their coursework.
